title: gweb1996
author: gweb1996
content: Be careful in the USA / Europe ! Dictatorship is coming !https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2022/jun/25/abortion-banned-in-multiple-us-states-just-hours-after-roe-v-wade-overturnedCould be false flag operation ...remember drugs or special psy project can f...k up people to do bad things https://deadline.com/2022/06/gun-safety-bill-senate-1235051247/https://www.who.int/europe/news/item/30-05-2022-eu-ban-on-microplastics-stubs-out-cigarette-butt-pollutionhttps://www.pbs.org/newshour/world/eu-lawmakers-back-stricter-emission-caps-in-climate-change-fight... The point is govs are telling us: eat what we give you, marry how we want you to marry, use your money the way we want you to use it,work until you die.... follow our rules or move to "Russia"  or die.It's time we organize and f..uk up their "Great Reset", govs should work for us the people not for the 1% rich. I even heard that people around the world are dying after they took Covid vaccine, sudden death they say ..."they can't find the cause".
